item.title: Random Friend Caller
item.description: The mental barrier to calling a friend randomly In the modern world, all your friends, no matter where in the world they are, are all just a single phone call or message away. Yet, despite this modern luxury, there can still be quite a mental barrier to actually picking up your phone and calling a friend randomly. You know they're a good friend who would actually probably enjoy having you call them, but you're still worried about whether they'll be busy, or if you're interrupting something.
